attributes.action: Add a day where secondary school students get to revisit primary.
attributes.additional_details: Its a win win Secondary students get to have a break from stressful schooling and revisit their primary one which many students want to do. Primary students get to get the day off and primary school teachers get to see there old students again.
attributes.background: Let secondary school students go back to primary and experience a day  as if they where in year six with their old teacher (if possible) and with a normal school day where they do year6 work and enjoy breaks just like the year 6s do.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about secondary school students visiting their past school would be a matter for the relevant schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
